definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
Bush (name)/George H.W. Bush (1924-2018), US president 1988-1992/George W. Bush (1946-), US President 2000-2008
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
to cover the whole (area)/to be found throughout
to be covered with/to be filled with

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布萊登叔叔，我真的很高興你邀請我們來。

sentences.english: Look at my feet, grandma frozen stiff decided to make a pair of cloth padded boots.

sentences.english: Shall weave old England's winding sheet .
sentences.chinese: 爲老英格蘭織起裹屍布。

sentences.english: Fabrics with a close weave are ideal for painting.
sentences.chinese: 編織緊密的布最適合作畫。

sentences.english: Resistance to solvent, strong in wet condition and be used as cloth.

sentences.english: And your clothes should feel just as fluffy with only a quarter of a dryer sheet.
sentences.chinese: 只用四分之一的防靜電布一樣可以使你的衣物蓬鬆。

sentences.english: Denim is a strong usually blue cotton cloth that is used especially to make jeans.

sentences.english: Could this be the burial shroud of Jesus Christ?

sentences.english: The first identity cards are expected to be issued in about 18months.
sentences.chinese: 第一張該類型身份卡預計在未來18個月內將被髮布。

sentences.english: The windows were decorated with decorated by a fringe of pinked cloth.
sentences.chinese: 窗戶用鋸齒形的布做成的流蘇作裝飾。

sentences.english: In this study, various coupling agents were also used to improve strength of particleboard.
sentences.chinese: 施加偶聯劑也可以提高玻璃纖維布增強刨花板的強度。

sentences.english: Users can write on the transparency as they wish, as private notes or public comments.
sentences.chinese: 批註可以是私人的，也可以對別人公開發布你的評論。

sentences.english: She ripped a piece of cloth in two.
